text: Random gripe... why oh why must the forms interface not include the main HubSpot navigation at the top

Hii Everyone :wave:,
Need a suggestion - Actually I worked on module named " *Come Back* " which allows the user to come back to the previously opened tab with the help of the messages. If you want you can also check the demo from the given link
<http://makewebbetter-4921395.hs-sites.com/come-back-demo>

Can you all please let me know that is it helpfull in conversion or decreasing bounce rate of the site.

<@U22PKFRU5> I see a code gallery submission here(if makewebbetter is happy to open source it obviously).

<@UF09V9A30> I doubt there are any stats on if that decreases bounce rate, would be really hard to actually track, and determine if that was the reason bounce rate changed.

I do think itâ€™s a valuable idea though. Idk if the module lets the user customize what text shows in the title but would be a great addition.
a good use-case for it would be landing pages.

oh that's super cool <@UF09V9A30> - nice work! :smiley:

Would you be open to adding it to the Code Gallery (in a small beta)? (see here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery> ) It would be really cool to showcase it there. :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks <@U22PKFRU5> <@U7SL518D6> <@UD53A9UUR> <@U38EZFVFE> for your opinions, and yes this module is developed considering in mind about the landing pages, it is fully customizable with what to show and we are open to add more features based on the suggestion. :tada:
Thankyou <@U22PKFRU5> <@U7SL518D6> <@UD53A9UUR><@U38EZFVFE> for your thoughts and opinion. :+1:
